objects.name: GameOver
objects.string:
Game Over
Please refresh the page

events.comment: Some may say that it's a bit too much code in this file and that I should decouple it into multiple files. I agree, but I wanted to focus on getting things working first and leave the refactoring part for the final version - I plan to split it into multiple files when I add more levels. For now, it's just grouped into categories which may potentially be moved to their own files.
Fix for falling state changes when the player collides with multiple platforms (engine bug?)
Reset all controllables; TODO: Change when adding a lever
Fix player falling through platforms (collision bug)
Skulls will have a special purpose later in the game
FIXME: Kill enemy only when the player jumps on it
